graphs

Class GraphFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphs.GraphFactory

  • public class GraphFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides static methods to generate EmpiricDistributionPanel- and HistogramPanel-Objects
    Author:
    Mathias Engmann

    • Method Detail

      • createHistogram

        public static HistogramPanel createHistogram(DataHandler data,
                                             int positionX,
                                             int positionY,
                                             int panelWidth,
                                             int panelHeight,
                                             int chartWidth,
                                             int chartHeight,
                                             boolean isDetailed)
        Instantiates and returns a HistogramPanel-Object
        Parameters:
        data - DataHandler to draw the class data from
        positionX - the x position of the origin within the panel
        positionY - the y position of the origin within the panel
        panelWidth - the total preferred width of the panel
        panelHeight - the total preferred height of the panel
        chartWidth - the total width of the chart
        chartHeight - the total height of the chart
        isDetailed - boolean. True if axis lables are to be painted
        Returns:
        a HistoGramPanel-Object

                                                                 int chartWidth,
                                                                 int chartHeight,
                                                                 boolean isDetailed)
        Instantiates and returns a EmpiricDistributionPanel-Object
        Parameters:
        data - DataHandler to draw the class data from
        positionX - the x position of the origin within the panel
        positionY - the y position of the origin within the panel
        panelWidth - the total preferred width of the panel
        panelHeight - the total preferred height of the panel
        chartWidth - the total width of the chart
        chartHeight - the total height of the chart
        isDetailed - boolean. True if axis lables are to be painted
        Returns:
        a EmpiricDistributionPanel-Object

        public static int getTotalWidth(java.util.ArrayList<StatisticClass> classes)
        Calculates the sum of the widths of given statistical classes
        Parameters:
        classes - ArrayList of StatisticClasses
        Returns:
        int designating the total width of all classes

      • getMaxHeight

        public static float getMaxHeight(java.util.ArrayList<StatisticClass> classes,
                                 int sampleSize)
        Finds the class with the biggest relative share of given statistical classes
        Parameters:
        classes - ArrayList of StatisticClasses to find the target in
        sampleSize - the numbers of samples that were stored in those classes
        Returns:
        the highest relative share of any given class

        Returns:
